fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn the 50-role file their post number falls into (e.g. 1401-1450). 11037: LE0N, 69420: Blackstoner, all Android roles, etc. are in the "misc" file.
- They will be immune to effects that would permanently change their role itself tonight, such as conversion, ability granting/stealing effects, etc.
- c is not defined
